channel.title: Funniest Words You Know
channel.description:
Just post the funniest words that you know.
Optional: Post the definition of that word too.
Funniest word I know; I'd have have to say 'asperger,' pronunciation: (ass-burgers). It means: children who lack non-verbal communication skills, demonstrates limited empathy with their peers, and are physically clumsy.
Seems kind of mean saying that's the funniest word I know, but it's pronounced funny.

item.title: Funniest Words You Know
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:369262”]If another mod objects, unlock it.

But honestly, can’t we have intelligent discussions instead? This is just stupid and childish. I know there’s others like this and I wish I could close them all. But it’s hard to give a clear reason for most.[/quote]

This is MoparSCAPE remember.

Read full topic

item.title: Funniest Words You Know
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:2, topic:369262”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=465394.msg3403427#msg3403427 date=1290132885]
Just post the funniest words that you know.

Optional: Post the definition of that word too.

Funniest word I know; I’d have have to say ‘asperger,’ pronunciation: (ass-burgers).
It means: children who lack non-verbal communication skills, demonstrates limited empathy with their peers, and are physically clumsy.

Seems kind of mean saying that’s the funniest word I know, but it’s pronounced funny.
[/quote]

“lock stupid topics”[/quote]
There’s plenty of stupid topics, I’d like to join in on that.

Liquid Magic:

why do you have a bill gates quote in your signature?

Because Bill Gates makes an excellent point when he says what he does in my signature.

“Life’s not fair; get used to it.”
-Bill Gates
He never went through college, yet he’s in the top 3 richest men in the world, and makes his employees go through a test before they can get the job.
I find that ironic and funny.

Read full topic

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

dandy;
-a man who cares about his physical appearance and acts as if they are upper class
-very good
